Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Application No. 20155176 HAM, submitted by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development for approval of an amendment to a previously approved tax exemption pursuant to Section 577 of the Private Housing Finance Law (PHFL) for a property located at 304-306 East 8th Street, Block 390, Lot 9, Borough of Manhattan, Community Board 3, Council District 2.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
